blocks.subject: Re: Mark Haedicke's visit to London
text: Welcome to the Legal Dept.!  I think Taffy was coordinating with you
regarding my dinner with Mark this week,  Unfortunately, my trip was canceled
at the very last minute this afternoon.  Mark is already aware of the change
but he may now have an open slot for dinner on Wed.
I'm sorry I won't be able to meet you this week but will look forward to it

blocks.subject: Mark Haedicke's visit to London
raw_header: Subject: Mark Haedicke's visit to London
text: Just to let you know, I have replaced Meagan, she has moved on to another
Mark would like to meet you for dinner on either Monday or Wednesday night
I am doing his itenerary and would appreciate it if you could e-mail me and
let me know what suits you.  I am of course assuming that you will be in
